statements: UPDATE wallet_addresses SET bitcoin_address = '1BitcoinAddress' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET ethereum_address = '0xEthereumAddress' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET bitcoin_address = '1BitcoinAddress', ethereum_address = '1EthereumAddress' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET cardano_address = '1CardanoAddress',bitcoin_address = '2BitcoinAddress', ethereum_address = '2EthereumAddress' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_wallets SET wallet_address = '0x123456789' WHERE user_id = 'a8d22f71-66d8-42e5-b4b0-8c562f101f32' AND currency = 'ETH';
UPDATE crypto_currencies SET decimals = 10, symbol = 'BTC' WHERE currency_id = '48c941db-c12a-4963-a7d6-5bb73471d7ec';
UPDATE user_wallets SET wallet_address = '0x123456789' WHERE user_id = '40be0b3c-4ab9-4b5d-9697-9f906c93741b' AND currency = 'ETH';
UPDATE crypto_currencies SET symbol = 'XRP', decimals = 6 WHERE currency_name = 'Ripple';
UPDATE user_wallets SET address = 'xyz_address1' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE username = 'user123'
UPDATE user_wallets SET address='0xabc123' WHERE user_id=123 AND currency='ETH';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newUsername' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET address = 'New York, USA', currency = 'USD' WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_wallets SET balance = 500.75 WHERE wallet_id = 2002 AND currency_id = 1;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET currency = 'BTC' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_wallets SET balance = 10.5 WHERE user_id = 456 AND currency_id = 1;
UPDATE user_wallets SET wallet_address = 'new_address' WHERE user_id = 123 AND cryptocurrency = 'ethereum';
UPDATE bitcoin_wallet SET balance = 1500.50 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE bitcoin_wallet SET balance = balance + 10.50 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE ethereum_wallet SET balance = balance - 5.75, ethereum_address = '0x7B2F8a95BaE5F3Ee236a4a3698a46c3868D94e1a' WHERE user_id = 54321;
